choices: He grows through the roof (his clothes dont grow with him)
He grows until just his head goes through the ceiling
1112.content:
Goku's stomach growled, he was starving. And not just his regular hunger either. It was a ravenous hunger he couldnt control. He had eaten most of the food in the house yet it hadnt satisfied him. He kept nagging her about when dinner was gonna be ready, and he always got the same answer "You'll just have to wait! Dinner wont be ready for a few hours" and everytime he groaned and went back to training.

But since this is Goku we're talking about, we all know he's weaker when he's hungry. Try as he might he just didnt have the energy. So he gave up and went into the living room. He sat on the couch and turned on the tv. Unfortunately it was the food channel, he turned the station, cooking show, he turned the channel and it was a soap opera. "Well i guess this is ok..." he thought relieved. Then it went to a commercial, it was a commercial advertising a fancy chinese resturaunt. "ARRGH!!!!!!!!!" he yelled as he threw the remote down and ran out fo the room.

He got weaker and weaker, his stomach seemed to begin to growl louder with every second. It was like it was taunting him, he couldnt stand it any longer! "Ahh! I can't take it anymore!!" he screamed. And then....he began to grow.
1112.title: Hungry Goku

11122.content:
As the hunger expanded inside Goku's belly, his body began to swell to match it. As Goku's head inched towards the ceiling, a loud ripping sound was heard throughout the room he was in (his bedroom) revealing his defined body. The growing continued on and on until Goku's head was pressing up against the ceiling. A few seconds later, cracks started appearing in the plaster around the top of his head. In less than a minute after that, Goku's head passed through the ceiling up to his neck. He panted as he finished growing, his mind clearly elsewhere. Now that he was over ten feet tall, the hunger plaguing him increased. He groaned and grabbed his stomach, the need for food overwhelming. Goku ducked down and moved towards the door, heading to the kitchen to see if Chi-Chi had finished cooking dinner yet. He lumbered down the stairs causing the whole house to shake. Goku's huge body appeared in the kitchen doorway and before he could even say anything, Chi-Chi said (without turning around), "You're going to have to wait just a little longer Goku. So please stop stomping around the house and be patient!"

Goku groaned loudly again, clutching his midsection. He needed food and he needed it NOW!
11122.title: Growing Hunger

112.content: Whose point of view will this story be from?
112.title: POV

1121.content:
Vegeta glared at Bulma long and hard. Did she really think he was going to put up with all this?!
"Woman, I need the gravity room fixed. Now!" he demanded; ignoring the fact that she was cooking his dinner.
"Sheesh, Vegeta, you think you can hold on a minute. Whats gotten into you, anyway? I eman, I know you've always been cranky, but I've never seen you like this!" Bulma said, staring at him thoughtfully, "You're gonna have to wait if you wnat me to do anything. Sit down and eat something."
Vegeta grunted. As much as he hated the thought, he had to admit that the woman was right. Lately, he just found himself getting angry quickly. Everything bothered him. Her cooking, her weakness, her slowness...and the baby Trunks....oh god!....the midnight wake ups with his earth-shattering shrieks; it was all too much to bear. It was almost as if...as if his body...no...his brain and his own personality screamed at him that he wasnt supposed to be living this kind of human life. A mate, a child- acting as both, a husband and a father- refraining from killing people. No. This wasnt the way he was raised.
And suddenly, it was as if the evil side of him that had hid for a while, was now returning and revealing himself once again.
"I'm not hungry," he grunted turning his back to her, making for the door. He needed to get some fresh air.
"Wait, Vegeta," Bulma called to him. She wondered why he was acting like that and if he was okay, "are you okay? Where are you going?"
He gave her the coldest stare she had ever received from him- not even back on Namek had he glared at her with such hatred.
"I'm going out, woman, dont question me," he said dangeroulsy, and with that, he opened the door and went outside, letting it slam. Hard.
The air was fresh and cool outside. He wanted to clear his mind of all these evil thoughts that were coming back. Yes, tehy were all back. The desire to kill, to enjoy the pain and the death of a weak one at his feet, to watch them squirm in agony...He stopped himself. H eknew he couldnt do it. As much as he hated to do it, he had to admit that he no longer wished to live the life he'd lived before. If he once hated love, he'd met Bulma. And try as he might, he could deny the way he felt about her- and his son.
If he'd ever wanted to beat Kakarot, now he had no reason to. Why, he had become supersayin already. And Kakarot posed no threat, anyway.
All he'd ever lived for, he had achieved.
And with that satisfaction, the evil thoughts quickly vanished from his mind. He turned around to go back in to his house...
And there it was...
He looked up to the sky and saw a full moon.
As he contemplated it, he felt a twitch in the area where his extra limb used to be.
* It cant be. It's been gone for years now!* he thought incredulously, as he felt something at his backside extending.
He looked back and sure enough, it had grown out."Impossible!" he almost yelled.
But then, there was no more time to question what had just occured. His thoughts were clouded by a blind need to satisfy his hunger. The floor beneath him became smaller and smaller, and so much smaller. The ape- for it looked nothing like Vegeta- looked up with furious eyes, as if yellin at the moon, and let out an enraged growl.
With a whisk of his huge hands, the roof of the Capsule Corp mansion was gone.
Bulma looked up in confusion; her eyes widened as they took in the monster in front of her. She let out a shriek as the ape's claw came towards her and grabbed her by her waist.
It didnt take long for her to realize that this ape, in fact, was Vegeta, the man she loved.
"Oh god, Vegeta, stop! Please! Dont do this!" she yelled hysterically as she came coser and closer to his mouth, her head bumping hard into one of his canines.
But he heard nothing. Not the shrieks, the tears, the pleading, the voice of the woman he refused to admit he loved. Nothing. The only thing he heard was his growling stomach- demanding that it be fed.
With one gulp- a clean swallow-she was gone.
All that was left of her was a strand of her blue hair on his teeth.
1121.title: How the VORE began

Today you and the rest of the son family had been invited to see a new experiment Bulma was working on. She had said it would change the world but then again, she says that about all her inventions!

After traveling at high speed with your wife Videl. You had noticed that your dad, Mom, Goten, Yamcha, Krillen and 18 had been invited (Pan didn't come because she blew up half the house and was grounded for it.) He noticed Mirai was there as well.

He had came back a while ago and told you that he was in love with you, but you told him you couldn't be together cause you were married. "Hey Mirai" you said sending your from your side to shake "Hey Gohan and Videl" he said as he shaked your hand. "Well, since your all here lets begin the exhibit." Bulma said through a speaker.

They all watched as she pulled out a capsule and pressed it. And with a burst of smoke, a 8 ft. ray gun appeared. "This is my newest invention. The Grow-a-matic 9000" (What a stupid name) you thought as you looked on. "This invention will change the world because everyone will no longer starve." As Mirai headed for the gun he aimed it at a small Tree. And with a hum the shot a black beam at the Tree. Nothing happend.

You and everyone else who watched were expecting more but then they watched as the small 3ft. tree grew quickly to a 60ft. tree. You all watched amazed and Bulma continued "With this new device, well will be able to make food 100 times its size feeding everyon around the world with fewer animals dying as well!" You clapped as well did everyone else when the machine began to go berserk, twisting and circling everywhere it shot one black beam at you....

1151111.content:
The demon world was a shadow of the known universe, home to countless powerful demons. With an iron fist, the realm was ruled over by the demon king Dabura, until the day that a strange magician came to the court. Few of the demons know precisly what occured next, but regardless the king was spirited away to the Earth and a barrier established to prevent their following. What began soon after was a war of succesion, divided between those whom wished to find the king and those that wished the throne for themselves, which ended with victory for the loyalists. Slowly they began to plan, searching for the way to break Babidi's seal.

Of course you have no idea of this political crisis, and are far too occupied with being bored. Goten and his parents are away for the weekend, and while you could easily fly to visit him you also happen to be grounded. This whittled down your choices to staying at home, or spending the day at the Capsule Corps R&D lab. Given that Capsule Corp has a hand in almost everything you decided they must have something interesting you could play around with, and you decided on the latter. Overall you are not much impressed with the lab however, and most of the inventions are quite boring. Suddenly you are distracted from looking amidst the shelves of rejected prototypes as an explosion rips through the nearest wall. Standing in the new opening are two beings, whom appear to be human save pointed ears. The taller of the two, a man with rather spiky red hair, immediatly points at you. "What luck, let's grab 'em!" At this point the shorter intruder, a young lady with chinlength green hair, elbows him in the side. She than walks a bit closer and gives a little bow. As she speaks, you quickly realize from their voice that both are actually male.

"Sorry, Girtil has never been big on manners; he likes to blow things up first and ask questions later." Girtil looks annoyed at this remark, but says nothing, allowing his comrade to continue. "My name is Kirt, and we're lieutenants in Micheel's force. We've heard quite a bit about you, and wanted to request that you help us with a matter."

Perhaps it was just Girtil's first impression, but you get a very bad feeling from these two. On the other hand you are bored out of your skull and their job might prove interesting. You decide to at least find out what it is. "If you want to ask somebody for help, you might want to think about not blowing everything up on your way in." Crossing your arms, you nevertheless continue. "But, what is it exactly that you want me to do?" Kirt begins to speak but quickly stops, staring behind you. There is no sense of ki behind you, however you also feel nothing from the two strangers and quickly spin around. A glint of metal flashes, and the other thing you see before blacking out is the blade of a scythe approuching your face.

As you slowly awake you can feel your limbs bound and a cold metal table beneath you. As you try to struggle free your tail flails rapidly. Suddenly it dawns on you that you have a fifth limb, and quickly look down. Sure enough a brown fuzzy tail is squirming about at your feet. Since you were a baby your tail had been cut off continually, and you were quite certain it was too early for it to be back. Noticing that you have awoke, a man with long blue hair and silver eyes turns his attention to you. "Well, so you awake at last. I am Micheel, acting ruler of the demon world. Some time ago our king went missing, apparently taken by a strange mystic. The Wizard created a barrier between the worlds that would keep us from coming to locate him, however it recently weakened. In this time we were able to get through a small force, whom were to locate King Dabura and bring down the barrier."

The only wizard you know of was Babidi, and since he had a demon with him you assumed that this had to be Dabura. "I don't care about your problems right now, why am I strapped to this table?!" Micheel gives you a smooth bow, which doesn't seem very appologetic. "We were pressed for time, and could not risk you refusing our offer. You must help us find the King." In a flash of energy you try to pull free of the restraints, but find them too strong. With a sigh you let your body fall limp. "Was this king of your's a tall red guy with horns?" Micheel smiles, which sends a chill down your spine, and steps closer. "So you have seen him afterall? This makes things far simpler. Do you know his location at the moment?" The memory is still shocking to you, but you relate it calmly. "He was eaten by a creature called Buu, sorry but your king is dead."

Micheel seems far from sad, and simply closed his eyes. "Well, then that means I am rightful ruler; and my second wave can commence." The demon seems far less benign by the second, and you struggle with renewed effort. "But none of this is answering why you trapped me here, and why I have a tail again!" Micheel's smile twists, allowing a small glimmer of fang to shine through. "It's simple really. You are of Saiyan blood, and therefore capable of becoming an Oozaru. However in this state you lose your mind and most your abilities. We have developed a method in which you will gain the size and power of an Oozaru, but retain your normal shape. With Dabura dead I rule the Demon World, and I have found this one quite to my liking. Therefore it is only natural I expand my empire. It's ironic that Dabura would have been eaten, as that is the fate that will befall this world's citizens. With a shout you charge all your power, but still the restraints hold you in their iron grip. "Noway! My dad and the others will never let you do that!" Micheel brakes into laughter, low and manic, his eyes locked upon you. "No no, it's you that will devour each and every one of them."

At this point a sharp pain pierces through your stomach, and you can feel the clasps growing tighter. Micheel gives you an inquisitive glance. "Oh? Has it begun already? We have used the strategy of living siege engines in the past, but Saiyans seem to be the best suited for it. Soon you will begin to grow rapidly, eventually dwarfing even the Oozaru. Your hunger will burn eternally, and if you do not eat your loved ones eventually you will go mad. Once your mind is broken, you will become an engine of sheer destruction. Either way they will all die, it's up to you wether you maintain your sanity. As the Earthlings bodies digest you will absorb there ki, adding to your own power." Micheel stops speaking as the clasps grow tighter still and finally burst. You are now free and quickly hop to your feet; now easily twelve feet tall. Micheel stares up with no fear at all. "So, will you serve me willingly, or simply go mad?"
1151111.title: An offer you can't refuse?

choices: Give in and eat the man
Try to fight back against the demons
11511111.content:
Trunk’s Brief could be pretty hot headed and immature but he wasn’t a complete idiot. The feeling of hunger was already stabbing at you like a thousand flaming knives. You look down at Micheel’s smug demonic grin and you grunt in a manner not dissimilar to the giant beast of your Saiyan lineage “Fine”.

“Excellent, well let's get started” Micheel clapped his silver eye’s flashing with glee as all of a sudden your growth exploded. In just a moment your body erupted out smashing through the top of the Capsule Corp lab. The harsh light of day highlighted the bustling city before you and all of the stunned citizens. Your eyes narrow as your vision blurs, the tiny moving shapes of humans seeming to glow each one teasing your stomach. Without thinking reflexively flick your tail snapping a traffic light in two and sending hover cars flying.

Girtil and Kirt hovered up around your head snickering. “Look at them run” the green haired demon cackled. For a moment you contemplate using your power to swat her out of the sky but the second you try to muster your Ki a searing pain strikes your stomach an echoing groan erupts from the angry organ.

Micheel teleported right next your head, now big enough for the demon to comfortable fit in your ear. “The only way to stave off the agony is to feed” he whispered and in one fluid movement glided forward pointing at the street below. The damage caused by your casual tail swipe had left a man injured trying to dislodge himself from the wreckage of his car.

Just one gulp and the pain would stop, you could fight back be the hero and then just fix everything with the dragon balls right?
11511111.title: Accept the offer and keep your mind.

1152111.content:
Ever since your adventure to Mount Paozu, Pack has been your closest friend. But despite the good results neither of you are much interested in returning. You were far more content to enjoy a less eventful life with Grandma Pan. It was as you were returning from school that you felt a sudden fluctuation. There was no word to describe what you felt, it was like a powerful wind tugging at your very soul. This was infact the beginnings of your ability to sense ki surfacing, but it was impossible for you to know. You were certain however that the pull was coming from your home. At this point you broke into a run, and to your horror saw smoke rising over the horizon. Sure enough, your house was in shambled when you arrive. The house was not burned down as you feared, someone had simply been using the fireplace to produce thick smoke, but it had certainly seen better days. Grandma Pan was nowhere to be seen, and a single word was simply scrawled upon the door "Paozu". The very thought of Grandma Pan in danger twisted your stomach, and you immediatly packed what little you could find and set out alone for the mountain.

The trip is uneventful, and you soon reached Mount Paozu. A steady ache fills your legs however you do not notice it in the slightest; your thoughts are completely on Pan. As you near the mountain you once more feel the strange gale, and cautiously follow after it. It's fairly obvious this is a trap, likely Mombi, but you dare not risk bring anyone else and endanger Grandma. As you turn a bend on the mountain you can make out three figures ahead, one of them Pan. The other two turn quickly, you made no sound yet they somehow knew of your presence. The taller of the two people resembles Mombi, however he is a bit taller and with straight red hair. The other is a boy your own age, dressed in an outfit that reminds you of royalty. The man leaps high above and comes down with a crash, causing you to stumble back, however a hand gesture from the boy halts him.

"Now now, that is enough Servill." The demon nods and takes a step back, allowing his apparent master to approuch you. "Well well, at last we meet Son Goku. I am Maou Yamu, ruler of Mount Paozu." This demon seems far more polite than the previous ones you encountered, however you are confused as to how he could be whom he says. "But I thought the Demon Lord was killed by the bear." Yamu chuckles a bit at this. "The bear you say? Interesting. And yes, while that oafish boar was the former lord of Mount Paozu, I claimed it for my own shortly after he fell." As you speak Yamu gestures to Pan to allow you to check that she is alright, and sure enough you find that she is simply unconcious. You are still furious with Yamu however. "Why did you have to take Grandma, what do you really want me here for?!"

Chuckling again, Yamu brushed a hair from his face. "I hate to burst your bubble, but the bears never really fought Yamao, the one whom killed him was you." Your memory of the time was fuzzy, yet your only recollection of the fight was running from Yamao, and than awakening to find him slain. It didn't seem possible that you could defeat such a powerful being. You shake your head as you think, apparently amusing Yamu quite a bit. The small demon now grins, stepping towards you. "Without you, I would never have become Maou. But all the same, my rule can never be concrete as long as you exist. You slew one Demon Lord and could very well slay another; that could cause some to question my absolute authority. Therefore, I'm simply going to have to eat you."

Considering that just about everyone you met on Mount Paozu in the past wanted to eat you, Yamu's announcement wasn't a huge surprise. However you still are made quite nervious and ty to back away. "Really, I couldn't have killed him! And even if I did somehow, I have no reason to try and hurt you!" It obviously has no effect on Yamu however and he dives at you again and again, embedding his fist in the ground each time. Finally you lose control of your emotions, and a clear wave of ki bursts up around your body. Yamu is blown back, falling flat on his face. Rocks explode all around as the small demon bursts back to his feet, a look of madness on his face. As he stands his neck twists forward, extending his head to a good five feet away. Immediatly you regain your senses. "A... Rokurokubi?!" Yamu regains control of his emotions as well in a moment, and his neck shrinks back. "Yes, I have a small amount of Rokurokubi blood, about as much as you have Saiyan blood infact."

Pan had never told you precisly what a Saiyan was, however you had a feeling that it had to do with the reason that only you had to cut off a tail now and again. Yamu did not clarify this as he continued on. "Yes, I had such a delightful discussion with Pan while we were waiting for you. She told us about the Saiyan, and your heritage, though I must admit it seemed she only let out what she wanted us to know. An odd one, your grandma." Yamu had apparently dropped his combat stance, though you stayed in your own, however he was not done yet. Gradually a ball of light began to form in his hand. "Maou's ultimate corruption, MINIMIZE!" With a shout he flung the ball towards you, and it seemed far to speedy to dodge. All you could do was shut your eyes and wait for the inevitable. As your eyes faded to white however you once more lost control, and a powerful aura erupted around you. You could hear Yamu screaming, and gradually opened you eyes. A rush of power unlike any you had ever felt was surging through you, and the minimize ball was nowhere to be seen. Yamu was staring in shock, and gradually slinking back. "It can't be... the energy inverted. Heh, I had intended to eat you after you shrunk, but now it seems you reversed the flow of energy and absorbed it. The process seems to be slower than the minimize; but it should still be as effective. I wonder how life will be when your a couple hundred feet tall, hehe. Enjoy it, because once I find out how you absorbed it than I'll return for you. Know that you are the ultimate rival of Maou Yamu!" With that Servill leaped upward and vanished, and Yamu lifted from the ground, floating back and over a mountain cliff with incredible speed.

All that mattered to you was rescuing your grandmother, however you worried that Yamu would do something really horrible next time; and that the trip was still in a way a failure. Nevertheless you and Pan are safe. Bending down over Pan you try to rouse her with your voice, and finally a pat on the cheek. Slowly her eyes begin to open, and she blinks up at you. "G...Goku? Well, I see you handled that demon pretty well. I knew even with me he wouldn't stand a chance against you." Smiling you help Pan up and began to tell her what really happened, when suddenly she interrupts. "Goku, have you grown from this morning?" Yamu had mentioned this, and while being a bit taller may be nice it still worries you.
1152111.title: Yamu's Curse

As a plus to shrinking, it also made the person immune to things like stomach acid and also gave the person regenerative abilities for a certain amount of time. You would use it on him and run before anybody saw you. This way it would take hours to find him. You laugh at the thought of this and approach the CC building. Nobody would be dumb enough to sneak into such a big corporation so as a result, it wasn't guarded very well. You could easily slip in without anyone noticing.

1232.content:
As far back as she can remember, Android 18 was fascinated about giants and giantess's. She wasn't sure where her fascination came from. It could've come from watching the both versions of "Attack of the 50 foot woman" before she became an android. Back then, she was a care-free person. But when Dr. Gero had changed her into an android, she had gotten more stern. Android 18's brain was part biological and part mechanical. In fact, Android 18 had both biological and mechanical parts all over her body. This is why she could have offspring with Krillin.
Her fascination of being a giantess could've come from sexual intercourse with Krillin, who was 2 feet smaller than her.
Android 18 was obsessed by the idea of her becoming a giantess. But how would she become a giantess? By making a wish with the dragonballs, or by other means?
1232.title: Android 18 wants to be BIG

12321.content: Android 18 wasn't sure how else she could grow into a giantess other than the dragonballs. Of course, a weird invention by Bulma would have worked, but 18 was far to impatient to wait for that. The dragonballs though, were easily accesible; her husband Krillin was always hanging out at Kame house so she knew that the balls were gathered over there. As 18 flew over a massive city, she couldn't help but think what it would be like to return to the same city, only a hundred or more times bigger; the excitement was killing her. Finally, she spotted Kame island in the distance. Quickly but carefully, 18 landed softly on the ground, hoping not to stir up any attention. After doing some crafty stealth work, thanks to her mechanical self, she left the house as quickly as she entered. Now carrying a red sack, only one question remained; Where would she summon the dragon?
12321.title: The wish...

choices: Only about as big as the island
123212.content:
18 figured that if she were to summon the dragon on Kame island, somebody would surely catch her before she even made the wish. She knew she would find a way to get the balls again, but she also wanted to grow in this episode! (yea i know...corny joke) She landed on a remote island and quickly emptied the bag. As soon as the balls were in place, she quickly went about summoning the dragon. The sky grew dark, everything was chaotic, you know the routine...
Shenron, big as ever, uttered, "Speak your wish"...
18 yelled up, "Please make me into a giantess! I want to be huge!"
After a brief pause, the dragon said, "It shall be done"
As this was said, the eyes on the dragon began to glow a deep red. 18 couldn't believe that her dream of becoming a giantess would finally come true. As if it was natural, the android began to grow bigger. She noticed that the rocks under her were cracking. Even her clothes were biginning to feel small.


How big does she grow?
123212.title: Distractions don't help

1232122.content:
Bigger and bigger she grew. Her clothes were eventually no more, and the island on which she was standing was now becoming too small for her to stand on.

(a few miles away, on kame island)
Krillin came through the door in shock, followed by Master Roshi with a pair of binoculars (that dirty perv, lol). They couldn't believe what they were seeing. The woman that Krillin fell in love with now appeared to be a hundred feet tall, and yet she was still growing! Neither of them even noticed that the dragon was summoned. Of course, Roshi couldn't keep his perverted mouth closed and said, "do you think she would make an old man like me happy?"
Krillin, now with flat eyes, said sarcastically, "Yea, i'm sure thats the first thing she wants to do"

(meanwhile, back at the island)

18 couldn't believe her size; she now had one foot in the water and the other covering the entire island! She looked for the dragon, but couldn't see it anymore. She wondered why that was, because the sky was still dark. Finally she looked down and gasped; she was now even bigger than the dragon! The dragon now only looked like a floating lizard to 18 now. Finally, after she reached about a couple thousand feet tall, the dragon said, for the first time with a hint of fear, "your wish has been granted" and disappeared. As the balls split up, two of them flew toward 18, one of which flew into a private spot. The other hit her skin and bounced off. 18 truly felt like a goddess; even with the z team's combined power she coulnd't be stopped. She did admit to herself that she was still a tad bit evil. The only thing left to decide would be where she would start her reign of terror.
1232122.title: Mega 18

choices: Krillin and Roshi land in 18's stomach
12321221.content:
Android 18 was 4,000 feet tall by now. She could see for miles around her; she saw Kame House and a city on the horizon. Her clothes were gone, and she looked like a kid in a candy store. She walked off the island, the ocean only reaching to her ankles. 18 made it to Kame House in two short (for her) steps. 18 looked down to see Krillin and Master Roshi on the small island and smiled.
Krillin and Master Roshi barely came up to 18's little toe! 18 was truly a goddess now. Nobody would be able to stop her, not even a super saiyan, or even a super saiyan 4! 18 picked up Krillin and Roshi and brought the two up to her face.
"Hi there, 18" said Krillin in a falsely bright voice. Roshi looked down to see...well, I think you know what he was looking at!
"Hello, my tiny husband" said 18. "I'm a goddess now. And I'm gonna have fun!"
18's stomach growled loudly.
"First, I need a snack" said 18, and tossed in Krillin and Roshi in her open mouth and swallowed the pair! 18 looked over to the city and smiled. Time for a feast!
12321221.title: Feast of a Goddess begins

choices: Its nothing, probably the city digesting.
123212212.content:
18 felt Krillin and Roshi slide down her throat; it was an amazing feeling. She had never before considered vore, but now that she had actually eaten someone, she realized how sensational it was.
"Well, I looks like I know how I’m going to play with this planet", 18 said in a voice so loud that it made ripples in the water far below. She started to walk over to a nearby city, which to her was about as wide across as a normal bedroom. Buildings were at the highest, no taller than her small toe. Once 18 was near the city, she got on her knees in the water so she could see the city better. Below, she could see tiny little people running about in panic. Since she was too big to pick them up, she simply lowered her head and breathed in as hard as she could. Hundreds of people began to fly up into the goddess’s mouth due to the insane winds on the street. 18 increased the intensity of the wind and now cars and buses were flying up into her mouth. Once she had enough, she slowly raised her head. In her mouth were many hundreds of people, cars, buses, and pieces of buildings. 18 loved the incredible sensation of half the city's population moving around in her mouth. She slowly began to move the people around her mouth, getting them as wet as she could se they would slide down her throat with ease. Finally, 18 gulped them down; hundreds of people, people with dreams and hopes, were reduced to nothing but food for an android. 18 suddenly noticed that there were helicopters flying nearby. It appeared as if Z-tv was trying to make a story out of her recent meal. She simply smiled and said, "Hey you."
The reporters in the helicopters heard this (which almost made them deaf as well!) and looked up at 18's face. 18 couldn't see the people in the helicopters because she was too big, yet she knew she had their attention, so she continued, "If you want a story so badly, why don't you report this..."
As soon as she finished, she began sucking air in very quickly, as she had done before with the people on the ground. The helicopters tried to fight the hurricane force winds, but to no avail. One by one, all the helicopters were sucked into the android's mouth. 18 felt a little prick as the blades of the helicopters came to an abrupt halt in her mouth, causing her to giggle for the first time in Dragonball history!
"Hmm...hopefully they were reporting live, hehehe", 18 said evily as she looked back down at the city in front of her. This time, she picked up entire buildings off their foundations and dropped them into her wet awaiting mouth; she didn't even chew the buildings, just swallowed. She kept eating and eating, as if her stomach had no limits. One by one, every skyscraper that used to stand proudly in the city was now travelling through the android's digestive track. The city was now no more, there were only a few people running for their lives away from the city. 18 didn't feel like wasting her time with them, she had just eaten an entire city. "Besides, they will probably run to another city, which I'll probably eat as well", she thought to herself and laughed. She then burped loud enough to make a window break and then stood up. She suddenly felt something as she was standing; it was a wierd sensation. What happens now?
123212212.title: A gigantic appetite

1232122121.content:
18 felt a weird sensation as she began to grow again. She now had one foot covering 3 feet away from the city and the other covering the entire city. Her feet were covered in sweat and blood, making it very squishy when she took a step. She was over 7 thousand feet tall, almost reaching the first level of the atmosphere.

After letting out a belch, that felt like a powerful shockwave to anyone a few kilometers away from 18, she felt something in her ass.

After scratching it, feeling wet from the pleasure, she then felt fur around it.

After turning around, she noticed that she had grown a Saiyan Tail, over 9 feet long and 3 feet wide. She also found it very soft and fluffy when she touched it with her hand.

That was when she had an idea, when a full moon popped out she would look into it and complete her rule.

The power that could be at her fingertips made her moan in pleasure
1232122121.title: She grows yet again

choices: Gohan goes to rescue Videl...only to be swallowed
1232122122.content:
18 felt that the feeling in her stomach was just the city digesting. She never had a meal big as that before. Normally, she wouldn't eat that much, but now that she was a goddess...well, it would be a waste being this big and not eat an entire city. Rubbing her stomach, 18 walked to the next city. She would eat a couple of cities first, than demand that the people worship her as a goddess. And she would demand human sacifices whenever she felt like it. Yes, 18 was on her way to taking over the world.
The next city she came too was bigger than the last city. 18 bended low over the city and started to suck people, cars, busses and small buildings into her waiting mouth. There were hundreds of people on her tongue before she gulped them all down. She next turned to the skyscapers, swallowing them down in one gulp. 18 rubbed her stomach, which wasn't half full yet!


"As you can see, we are still broadcasting in the stomach of this woman" said the reporter in one of the many helicopters that was in 18's stomach. The view behind the reporter was that of a roof of a skyscaper.
Gohan stopped eating when he saw 18 on TV. So did Goku and Chi-Chi.
"What happened to 18?" asked Goku.
"And what caused her to grow that big?!" asked Chi-Chi.
"The dragon balls?" suggested Gohan.
"Wait!" said the reporter. "you're Videl, daughter of Herclue!"
Sure enough, there was Videl on TV.
"Yes" said Videl. "I've been trying to free everyone in here, but it's no use. Maybe my husband and some of his friends could help"
"How are we supposed to stop 18 when she's that size?" asked Chi-Chi.
1232122122.title: Reporting from 18's stomach

choices: Go to the Son family's POV
12321221221.content:
As Goku, Chi-Chi, and Gohan pondered what to do with 18, the house shook a bit.
"Did you feel that?" Gohan asked.
Goku and Chi-Chi nodded to this as the house shook yet again. Pretty soon, the Son family noticed that it wasn't the house that was shaking, it was the ground.
"Footsteps...Shes coming!" Goku said.
Before any of them could do anything though, the house really did start to move...right off its foundation!
"Dammit", said Chi-Chi aloud, "I thought she was on our side!"
"Apparently not", Gohan replied.
The house started to rise and rise; the only reason why it was probably staying together so well is that Goku made the house strong in case of villains, not that it would matter now that they could destroy planets. The house suddenly stopped rising at what seemed like the height of an average mountain.
The Son family was oblivious to what was happening, but they all knew that it was 18 out there, and she was not in a good mood.
Goku finally managed to power up and blast tons of furniture that fell on him when the house moved. After he was free to move about his messed up house, Goku headed toward the window and thought to 18 telepathically, "18! What are you doing? Stop this nonsense and put my house back on the ground!"
18 smiled at this and thought back, "I'm sorry Goku, but that I can't do. See, I've been pretending I was one of the you ever since Cell arrived because I knew there was no way that I'd defeat any of you, but now I am the invincible one!" At this she tilted her head back and laughed evily, making the windows on Goku's house shatter.
At this Goku and Gohan turned into Super Saiyan 2's and prepared to jump out towards the Goddess android. She finally noticed and shaked her head as if she was tsk tsking them and said, "uh uh, i'm the more powerful one so now I make the rules...and I say you are lunch!!!"
With that, the entire house moved toward 18's face as she opened her collosal mouth. She finally let go of the house and the Son family along with their home flew into the Goddess's mouth. She wasted no time enjoying the shear power of what she was doing. She smiled as she felt two Super Saiyan 2's attacking her mouth, trying to break free. It felt only like minor pricks on the inside of her mouth. She once again spoke telepathically, this time to all three of them, "It dosn't matter what you guys do your still going to my belly! Hahahaha!"
With that, she swallowed Goku's house, along with Goku and Gohan at SS2, and also with Chi-Chi still inside the house doing the "what did i do wrong" speech.
The house slowly traveled down as 18's throat slowly squeezed it toward her belly. 18's laugh could still be heard when the house landed on the warm, moist surface of the android's stomach.
12321221221.title: The Son house no more

123212212211.content:
The Son family house landed on a 'dry' patch of stomach floor. Goku and Gohan managed to save Chi-Chi from being crushed under the stove as it fell to the house's floor thanks to the house's landing within the stomach of 18.
The Son family walked out of the house to see 18's vast stomach. Here and there, they could see electric lights and headlighs from cars. Some sections of the cities that 18 had eaten still had power, thanks to the fact that 18 had swallowed several power plants along with the two cities in her stomach. The 'floor' of the stomach was devoid of stomach acid, but made squishy sounds as you walked on it.
The stomach was so vast that the Son family couldn't see the sides of the stomach, or the 'roof' of the stomach so many miles up.
"Great" said Gohan. "how are we supposed to get outta here?"
"It would be impossible" said Gohan. "18 is so large that she couldn't feel our attacks on her"
"That's right" said 18, speaking telepathicaly to Gohan. "you're all small ants to me now"
"18 is large because of the dragon balls" said Goku. "what else could make 18 so big?"
"But the dragon balls won't be in here" said Chi-Chi. "They scatter everytime someone makes a wish. I doubt that 18 could catch them as they're scattering"
"And besides" said Gohan. "the dragon balls turn into ordinary rocks once the dragon's been summoned"
"I think 18 was right" said Chi-Chi. "nothing can stop her now"


18 was walking her way towards yet another 'big' city. She wasn't going to eat the city...yet. She'll let the people have a head start and then eat the city. Nothing could escape her. Everything would end up in her belly. By the time her stomach is full, she would've ate everything on Earth.
18 was passing by a lake just then. It was a pretty good-sized lake, even to the giant android. She smirked when she saw boats on the lake and tiny little humans swimming in it. 18 bended over and stuck her head in the water. There, she sucked up the water and everything that was in it or on it. In 5 short minutes, the entire lake was in her stomach.
"Yum, that hits the spot" said 18.
123212212211.title: 18's feast continues

1232122122111.content:
As the Son family and countless others looked up in the massive belly of the android, a wall of water came crashing down. It was as if niagra falls had just opened up over them. Many people tried to desperatly flee the raging waters. Luckly, the water finally settled in the lower part of 18's belly. Everyone in the stomach was drenched with lake water by then.
A while went by without anyone saying a word. Everybody knew what was happening but nobody knew what to say. Gohan finally broke the silence by getting very angry and flying up. Turning Super Saiyan 2, he started throwing Kamehamehas and Masenkos at the side of 18's stomach walls.

(Meanwhile, outside of 18's body)
18 felt little pricks on the inside of her belly. This made her smile and rub it, saying, "Aww whats a matter? Don't want to be eaten by a gorgious woman like me?"
This voice was loud enough to be heard inside her, as she felt the attacks stop. She simply laughed at this, and waited for the next city to panick enough for her pleasing.

(Back in 18's stomach)
Gohan quickly tired himself out and went back to normal as he descended back onto the ground. Goku then approached him and said, "I know your mad son, but your not going to get out of here just by attacking the wall...why do you think I didn't turn into a Super Saiyan 3 or 4? Just conserve your energy, we have to use our heads to win this fight."
Gohan looked up and said, "okay."
Suddenly, a familier sound could be heard by the the two of them; it was the sound of someone flying!
1232122122111.title: The flood and the rage

choices: Bulma just happens to be working on a shrinking ray
18 has some fun in the city before eating it
12321221221111.content:
Krillin was flying towards the three Son family members. Krillin was carrying Master Roshi with him. Roshi had never learned to fly (since he was the oringal owner of the Nimbus Cloud), so Krillin was carrying Roshi to Goku and family. Those two weren't the only ones flying towards the trio; Videl was also flying towards her in-laws.
"Ah, I was wondering if you were going to show up" said Krillin, landing on the floor of 18's stomach. Videl landed beside Gohan.
"So, how are we gonna get out of here?" asked Videl.
"I don't think we can" said Goku. "18 will just swallow us again if we get out of her belly"
"I argee" said Roshi. "but what's so bad about being in a stomach of a babe like 18?!" (you gotta love that perv, lol)
"Well, I didn't imagine spending the rest of my days in the belly of Android 18" said Gohan.
"We need to come up with a plan" said Krillin.
There was a pause.
"Hey, why aren't we digesting?" asked Videl.
"You know, I've been wondering about that" said Gohan. "maybe 18's stomach doesn't digest food anymore since she's an android now"
"Maybe" said Krillin. "she doesn't eat that much...well, when she was normal-sized"
"Maybe Bulma has something that can shrink 18 down to size" suggested Goku.



*Outside*

18 rubbed her stomach, missing the tickling of the attacks by Gohan. Those attacks didn't hurt her, in fact they made her giggle again. How she loved being a goddess now!
18 spotted a city on the horizon. She also spotted Kami's lookout. Or..was that Dende's Lookout nowadays? It didn't matter either way. The Lookout came to 18's neck, which impressed her. She didn't realize that the lookout was so high in the air. She smiled as she reached for the lookout and swallowed it in one gulp. Then, she headed for the city.

choices: He leads them towards the opening of the mouth
12321221221112.content:
As the sound grew louder, Goku and Gohan knew right away that it was the sound of someone flying using ki, but who? Finally, a figure could be seen flying towards them. No details could be seen of this strange being, all that could be seen was a single sword on the person's back, sort of like trunk's.
"Who's that?" Goku asked as the figure got closer.
Gohan simply shook his head in confusion and said, "One of the Z team maybe?"
Goku didn't buy it though, "Nah, I don't recognize the energy, its someone new."
Finally, the being came into full view and landed in front of the two saiyans. He looked as if he were 17 years old and had medium long black hair. He also had a scar under each eye, forming sort of like X's.
"Looks like you two could use a hand", the man said in a calm voice.
Goku and Gohan just stared in silence before noticing that he had a tail!
Goku, being his usual discrimitary self against saiyans, put his guard up and said, "your a saiyan arn't you!"
"Yes", the man replied, "but not an evil one."
Goku and Gohan looked at each other and then back at the mysterious man.
Gohan then spoke, rather skeptically, "Who are you, and what can you do to help us?"
"My name is Gotan and I can help you get out of here", the man replied.
"how?" Goku asked.
Gotan simply smiled at this and said, "I come from a world of saiyans, yes. Though its probably not the one you are thinking of. My home planet is called Collossu, it is located in the south galaxy; its one of the few planets that were not destroyed by Broly."
Goku and Gohan exchanged confused faces.
"On the planet there are two types of saiyans...the small ones, and the big ones. The small ones are about the size of you and me, we were actually pioneers from the old planet Vegeta. We fled the planet due to Frieza and the planet pirating business", Gotan continued.
There was a short pause in his voice and then he finally said, "The other type is the big kind of saiyans; they are kinda like us but not. They are very much like saiyans and have the same basic abilities, only they are about as big as this woman that has seemed to grow herself. I can help you because I've been eaten many times...it happens on my world..."
Gotan seemed to be a bit embarrased as he said this, but then put on his serious face once again.
Goku and Gohan were having trouble in believing the young man's story, but they were screwed either way.
"Hmm, well...might as well trust him, things can't get any worse", Gohan said.
To this Gotan smiled and said, "Follow me then, and don't forget the girl."
To this Chi-Chi's face got solid red and she screamed, "I am not a girl!!!I'm a woman!!"
To this everyone fell anime style.

124.title: POV

1241.content:
You're a worker at the famous Capsule Corp. which makes all sorts of useful things. You have worked for the company for 12 years now. You're the head of security, not that anybody attacks Capsule Corp. Capsule Corp. had always had strange protection. That protection came in the from of several remarkable people. People who had saved the world several times. You know all these people by name, for some of them live at Capsule Corp HQ. Dr. Brief's daughter is even married to one of these supermen.
